thumb.title: [TAS] Arcade Metal Slug X "1 player" by McBobX in 16:03.66
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S6Cc99OhmkY以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6663MTAS originally published on 2025-08-03Metal Slug X (1999) is an updated version of Metal Slug 2, the second installment of an immensely popular run'n'gun series released on the Neo Geo MVS. The games are notable for incredibly detailed pixel graphics, fluid animation, and good humor; but the real key to their longevity is, of course, their high difficulty as far as survival goes.McBobX (https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/McBobX) runs through the game using 1 player in record time. Improving upon the previous publication ( https://tasvideos.org/1385M ) by 03:00.26.
